imdb.title: Komi-san wa, Komyushou Desu.
imdb.plot: An elite and aloof schoolgirl is in fact severely withdrawn and anxious about communicating with others. An ordinary schoolboy befriends her and helps her to open up and talk with people.

episodes.title: It's Just the Arrival of Winter. Plus more.
episodes.plot: On one cold morning, Komi wraps a scarf around her neck to keep warm, but as soon as she gets to school, Najimi plays a trick on her.

episodes.title: It's Just a Typhoon. Plus more.
episodes.plot: There's a typhoon blowing over Komi's neighbourhood. School has been cancelled, but Komi is still afraid of the thunder. Komi invites Onemine and Kaede for a cat cafe visit.

episodes.title: It's Just a Feeling. Plus more.
episodes.plot: Hoping to understand their classmate Komi more so they can be friends with her, Nakanaka and Yamai decide to talk to Tadano.

episodes.title: It's just a merry Christmas.
episodes.plot: On Christmas Eve, Komi panics when she reads a message from Najimi, challenging her to buy presents for all her friends. She brings Shousuke along. Later that day, everyone arrives at Komi's house, where they try to figure out where Komi will sit so they can sit next to her, and play the King Game.

episodes.title: It's just a snowman/It's just a snowball fight/It's just the end of the year/It's just New Year's.
episodes.plot: Tadano and his friends engage in a snowball fight with a group of elementary school kids, who are joined by a reluctant Komi. Later, Komi and her family visit Yuiko's household for New Year's Eve, where Akira teaches Komi how to play hanafuda.

episodes.title: It's just everyone's New Year's/It's just ice skating/It's just a cold.
episodes.plot: Katai gathers his courage to invite Tadano to an ice rink. When he goes to meet Tadano, he is shocked when he sees Komi came as well. Later, Tadano is confined to his bed after he comes down with a fever. He tries to call Najimi for help, but accidentally calls Komi instead.

episodes.title: It's just a misunderstanding/It's just a hallucination/It's just a narcissist/It's just a group decision for the school trip.
episodes.plot: Komi is nervous because she thought Najimi saw her holding hands with Tadano when they visited his house. Naruse wants to talk to Komi. Komi reveals her past to Tadano as the students are preparing for a class trip.

episodes.title: It's just the school field trip.
episodes.plot: Komi arrives at the train station to meet with her friends. Kato and Sasaki, the two girls in her group, agree to make Komi's trip a memorable one. When class 1-1 arrives in Kyoto, they meet with their tour guide, Ryouko Tenjouin, who is quickly disheartened by the lack of interest from the class.

episodes.title: It's just day 2 of the field trip.
episodes.plot: On the second day, Komi's group visits more places with her ending up making two more friends along the way.

episodes.title: It's just Valentine's Day.
episodes.plot: Onemine invites Komi to her house to make chocolates for Valentine's Day. Alongside Otori and Onemine's younger siblings, she bakes a chocolate cake. At school, Komi receives chocolate from her friends and she gives the ones she made back. Katai manages to give his to Tadano, while Komi feels guilty for being unable to do so.

episodes.title: It's Just Ripped Tights. Plus more.
episodes.plot: At school, Komi's friends thank her for the chocolate. However, she dreads facing Tadano when she recalls what happened. Akako Onigashima, normally friendly and energetic, periodically gets angry when things do not go her way. Amami Satou, a very sweet and calm girl, has trouble saying no to people. Komi and Tadano have a fight for the first time after they cannot agree on how to solve a shogi problem proposed by Katou.

episodes.title: It's just White Day. Plus more.
episodes.plot: Tadano thinks about what to give Komi for White Day. He asks Hitomi for help. At school, Komi and her classmates play Eraser War. After school, Komi and Tadano reflect on their approaching second year.

episodes.title: It's just, I wish I could speak.
episodes.plot: Timid Tadano is a total wallflower, and that's just the way he likes it. But all that changes when he finds himself alone in a classroom on the first day of high school with the legendary Komi. He quickly realizes she isn't aloof--she's just super awkward. Now he's made it his mission to help her on her quest to make 100 friends!

episodes.title: It's Just a Childhood Friend. Plus More
episodes.plot: Tadano struggles to find friends for Komi so he resorts to asking his trusty childhood friend, Osana Najimi.

episodes.title: It's Just Stage Fright. Plus More
episodes.plot: Tadano and Najimi begin searching for new friends for Komi. They eventually land on the socially anxious Agari.

episodes.title: It's Just a Physical. Plus More
episodes.plot: During the school health checkup, competitive classmate Yadano is determined to clock better results than Komi, whom she sees as her ultimate rival.

episodes.title: It's Just My Summer Uniform. Plus More
episodes.plot: Komi wonders why everyone starts staring at her when, like the rest of the student body, she switches from her winter to her summer school uniform.

episodes.title: It's Just a Joke. Plus More
episodes.plot: When Tadano gets to school, he finds Komi waiting for him in the classroom. She then nervously hands him a letter.

episodes.title: It's Just the Pool. Plus More
episodes.plot: Komi spends a lot of time getting ready for her trip to the local pool with Tadano and Najimi. Once they're there, they bump into even more friends.

episodes.title: It's Just Obon. Plus More
episodes.plot: It's the Obon holidays, and Komi is visiting her grandma's house. She can't help but feel a little awkward around her extended family.

episodes.title: It's Just a Country Kid. Plus More
episodes.plot: It's the first day of the new semester and everyone is happy to see Komi again, but then a student named Inaka starts to follow her around.

episodes.title: It's Just Sports Day. Plus More
episodes.plot: On the school sports day, Komi isn't sure how to properly cheer for her classmates, but she does her best. Then, it's her turn to run the relay race.

episodes.title: It's Just a Performance For The Culture Festival. Plus More
episodes.plot: The students of class 1-1 have to decide what they're going to do for the culture festival - a task they're all taking way too seriously.

episodes.title: It's Just The Culture Festival.
episodes.plot: At the culture festival, Najimi is up to something. They try to rope Komi and Tadano into their scheme.
